content:
aka yeet the undesirables aka _mm_maskz_compress_epi64 for bytes (_mm_maskz_compress_epu8 plz)

With avx2 I split ymm into two xmm and use bmi2 pdep+pext to turn _mm256_movemask_epi8 into xmm shuffles.

But that's not portable at all. (Maybe call it std::simd::Mask.retain<U>(self, values: Simd<U, LANES>) -> Simd<U, LANES>?)
